name: Runa - AI Network Assistant
author: ValwareIRC
description: Responsive UnrealIRCd Network Agent - An AI-powered assistant that can help you manage your IRC network using natural language

api_key.label: API Key
api_key.description: API key (required for OpenAI/Anthropic, optional for custom endpoints)

api_endpoint.label: API Endpoint
api_endpoint.description: API endpoint URL (required for Ollama/Custom, e.g. https://text.pollinations.ai/openai)

model.label: Model Name
model.description: The model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-3-sonnet, llama3)

keyboard_shortcut.label: Keyboard Shortcut
keyboard_shortcut.description: Key to press with Ctrl+Shift to toggle Runa

auto_fetch_context.label: Auto-Fetch Context
auto_fetch_context.description: Automatically fetch network stats when starting a conversation

max_history.label: Max Conversation History
max_history.description: Maximum number of messages to keep in conversation history
